Effects.Full:
Extra Movement: Can move once, but is unable to execute any commands

Prey Mark: At the end of the action, if the holder is within a 5 tile radius of Ullrid, Ullrid deals AoE Physical damage equivalent to 100% ATK to the holder. This effect cannot be dispelled

Movement Reduction II: Reduces Movement Speed by 2 tiles. This is considered as a movement type debuff

Whirlwind: Gains 6 tiles of Extra Movement, and allows Ullrid to use Blade Whirlwind

Hunter's Talent: Ullrid's special mark. This effect cannot be dispelled

Camouflage: If there are any allies on the field, the holder cannot be targeted by normal attacks or skills. One stack is consumed for each damage instance taken. This effect can be stacked up to 2 times, and cannot be dispelled

ATK Increase I: Increases ATK by 10%. This is considered as a buff

Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 5 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.SkillName:
Hunter's Sight

(Skill / Single Target / Melee / Debuff)
Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 3x3 tile radius and deals melee Physical damage equivalent to 120% ATK to it, and gains 6 tiles of Extra Movement. If this skill did not kill the enemy, applies Prey Mark on the target for 2 turns
Skill.Vertebrae 3: If this skill did not kill the enemy, applies Movement Reduction II for 2 turns. Decreases damage dealt by targets with Prey Mark by 20%

Skill2.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 3x3 tile radius and deals melee Physical damage equivalent to 90% ATK to it. Gains Whirlwind after attacking
Skill2.Vertebrae 1: If Ullrid attacks the same target within a single action, increases damage dealt by 30% and enhances the effect of Whirlwind, allowing her to ignore damage reduction from Cover when attacking

Ultimate.Description:
Selects a tile within a 5 tile cross-shaped radius, drops on the tile, deals melee Physical damage equivalent to 180% ATK to the enemy with the highest HP within a 1 tile radius

Consumes all stacks of Hunter's Talent, for each stack consumed, increases damage dealt by this attack by 10%, with the maximum being 30%. If Ullrid has 2 or more stacks of Hunter's Talent, she gains 2 stacks of Camouflage for 1 turn
Ultimate.Vertebrae 4: Increases attack radius by 2 tiles. Increases the maximum limit of the damage increase gained when Hunter's Talent is consumed to 60%
Ultimate.Vertebrae 6:
Before attacking, for each 2% missing HP that the target has, increases ATK for self by 1%. If this skill kills the enemy, increases damage dealt by the next active attack by 30%. 

If Ullrid has 2 or more stacks of Hunter's Talent, she only gains 1 stack of Camouflage, but Camouflage will no longer be consumed when receiving damage

Passive.Description:
After using an active attack, gains 1 stack of Hunter's Talent and increases Contamination Gauge by 1 point

At the end of an enemy's action, if Ullrid's HP is below 30%, she gains 1 stack of Camouflage for 1 turn. This effect has a cooldown of 3 turns
Passive.Vertebrae 2: At the start of the battle, for each ally (excluding self) on the field, Ullrid gains 1 stack of Hunter's Talent and increases Contamination Gauge by 1 point
Passive.Vertebrae 5: Before attacking, if Ullrid has moved 2 or more tiles, increases ATK by 20%. Increases the HP threshold for gaining Camouflage to 50%, and decreases the cooldown of this effect by 1 turn

1.Effect: If Ullrid attacks the same target within a single action, increases damage dealt by 30% and enhances the effect of Whirlwind, allowing her to ignore damage reduction from Cover when attacking

2.Effect: At the start of the battle, for each ally (excluding self) on the field, Ullrid gains 1 stack of Hunter's Talent and increases Contamination Gauge by 1 point

3.Effect: If this skill did not kill the enemy, applies Movement Reduction II for 2 turns. Decreases damage dealt by targets with Prey Mark by 20%

4.Effect: Increases attack radius by 2 tiles. Increases the maximum limit of the damage increase gained when Hunter's Talent is consumed to 60%

5.Effect: Before attacking, if Ullrid has moved 2 or more tiles, increases ATK by 20%. Increases the HP threshold for gaining Camouflage to 50%, and decreases the cooldown of this effect by 1 turn

6.Effect:
Before attacking, for each 2% missing HP that the target has, increases ATK by 1%. If this skill kills the enemy, increases damage dealt by the next active attack by 30%. 

If Ullrid has 2 or more stacks of Hunter's Talent, she only gains 1 stack of Camouflage, but Camouflage will no longer be consumed when receiving damage

1.Effect: If Ullrid is at full health, increases damage dealt by 15%

2.Effect: If Ullrid counters the enemy's weakness, she gains ATK Increse I for 2 turns

3.Effect: CRIT +5.0% / Before attacking, if the target is not at full health, increases damage dealt by 7%
